attributes.action: Use full military force to stop Ahmadinejads planned Holocaust 2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following Durban II and Ahmadinejad call for the anihilation of the state of Israel, it is time initiate action in your parliament that will convey a clear message to the whole world that we have learned the lessons of the past and that 2009 will not be a repetition of 1939. 

It is the duty of our government to use full military force against Ahmadinejad just as we did against the NAZI party but without the delay.  It is unacceptable to me that we sit by and do nothing whilst this man is aquiring a nuclear weapon capable of matching his aspirations

rejection.details: Ahmadinejad did not announce a planned holocaust 2 at the UN conference. Please re-submit your petition and remove reference to planned holocaust 2. Please state clearly in the title what action you want Government to take, and no more. Thank you.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
